metadata.title: CVE-2022-48686 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme-tcp: fix UAF when detecting digest errors We should also bail from theio_work loop when we set rd_enabled to true, so we don't attempt to readdata from the socket when the TCP stream is already out-of-sync orcorrupted.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
